dialog: I'm not sure what provisions we require, wizard.
Might I suggest you go and inspect the larder, wizard?
I would be most grateful if you would take care of that for me, wizard.
Why not simply secure the essentials, wizard?
What do you mean, wizard?
Eggs, milk, bread, things of that nature, wizard.
Create that list, wizard.
Of course, no trouble, wizard.
Greetings, do take a seat. Let us get straight to business. This is our pact. Please read it thoroughly before affixing your signature.
As we have reached an understanding on all terms, there should not be any obstacles for the pact.
Allow me to remind you once more, the pact can be dissolved with a month's notice.
Yes, I comprehend. Thank you.
Pardon me, is this the baggage reclaim for flight KL17?
Yes, how may I assist you?
This is my baggage tag for reclaim. Might I have my belongings now?
Very well, here you are.
Many thanks.
Did you manage to attend the basketball match on Friday night, wizard?
I was unable to attend, wizard.
You missed out, it was quite thrilling, wizard.
